data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ta9W0jkmAZMQ7kNvgFz98RC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCBUg-v057RLbx1pMVH7YskXB0DlLSuRIX9Zc0VH7dzQw&oe=6697AB9C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2p2lvxmO63EQ7kNvgEFdRCv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAsdFswa9VS6gSqSTN17dMzsoDjRoDJjH0R9ypvropHOQ&oe=6697B524)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=H9VOsaKjOiUQ7kNvgGsWiLk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAf9oOItKfE6yZEuHEAK5FMBGQFNuLSEhbad3eckapNeA&oe=66979C87)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=A9K78xOYSrEQ7kNvgHcCT5I&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYApiYOYeEALOLbh3k9XVuM9goVpyT9iTX-A1bR6_4nakA&oe=66978F66)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0e6T1mj6eQcQ7kNvgHTv3CM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCNa5NPKKyBUeaT2UIxQ_qTB8R2Dy8g0Iuy2KpDR0nh2Q&oe=6697BBD8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=c6_yNqRhUowQ7kNvgGBLJOo&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDfDmY9aXLNeaCfTpFkGDiZpSLE_tC0Fj02m5a4Cp26jA&oe=6697B859)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gzwcuWnkUPgQ7kNvgGSTApf&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAn9VeXWZbwxMcDm5ka9Yd0P7E-kGzv-MT2rjypMjA2-Q&oe=66979E70)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NZ6inZ86FfcQ7kNvgH0YDfs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBrAQnvuGF9AjV7tjRN1HY2DOMNO2-Ai_nifPb3oJBMqw&oe=669788EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=uNisn9qVeQoQ7kNvgFkUX9x&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA5F-TuQqSXd-BUmOU2r0ybRtrsdmwcWJRmoI8gelRtJw&oe=66979C97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=pE57CJ1GPygQ7kNvgF9Ucjw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDUJMBI4nAH0icWtiv4-HKuVFuIAFM7IGkn0dgWgbCJiA&oe=6697B80C)
